verbose_text: Since MV specific CTL is predominantly restricted by HLA class II molecules, while FLU specific and mumps specific CTL have large HLA class I restricted components, reduced MV specific CTL may reflect a broader reduction in HLA class II restricted CTL in patients with MS.
evidence: HLA class II molecules, while FLU-specific and mumps-specific CTL have large HLA class I-restricted components, reduced MV-specific CTL may reflect a broader reduction in HLA class II-restricted CTL in patients with MS
